comment:
Nose: peat and sweetness.

Palate: peat, spicy, lemon.

Finish:

Rubbery and medicinal peat smoke. Once acclimated to the peat, there’s a lot of bright citrus and honey. The higher abv amplifies all of these flavors but isn’t overwhelming.... it also seems to bring out a toasted marshmallow note that I don’t recall getting with the standard 10.
First peated scotch. Go big or go home. I loved it!!!!
